publicApiKey.name: public-api-key
publicApiKey.description: Your public API key from the Yuno Dashboard

accountCode.name: account-code
accountCode.description: Your account identifier. The alias X-Account-Code is also accepted.

value.description: Payment amount in major currency units (e.g., 150.00 means 150 BRL, not cents). For zero-decimal currencies like CLP and PYG, use whole numbers (e.g., 15000 means 15,000 CLP).

document_number.description: Document number (digits only). CPF: 11 digits, CNPJ: 14 digits.

callback_url.description: URL to receive server-side payment notifications

return_url.description: URL to redirect the customer after payment completion (required for 3DS, PIX, and redirect-based methods)

payment_methods.description: Available payment methods for this session

callback_url.description: URL to receive server-side payment notifications

return_url.description: URL to redirect the customer after payment completion (required for 3DS, PIX, and redirect-based methods)

checkout_session.description: The checkout session ID from the create session response

token.description: Payment method token (for tokenized card payments)

vaulted_token.description: Vaulted payment method token (for returning customers)

capture.description: Whether to automatically capture the payment. Set to false for auth-only flows. Defaults to true.

merchant_order_id.description: Your unique order reference. If not provided, inherits from the checkout session.

transactions.description: Individual processing attempts for this payment

refunds.description: Refund records associated with this payment

three_ds.description: 3DS authentication details, present for card payments

redirect_url.description: URL to redirect the customer for 3DS challenge

metadata.description: Custom key-value pairs set by the merchant

failure_reason.description: Decline details when status is DECLINED or REJECTED

provider_code.description: Raw decline code from the payment provider

customer_id.description: ID of the associated customer record

installments.description: Installment details if payment was split into installments

plan_id.description: Installment plan ID if using merchant installments

account_id.description: Account IDs this plan applies to

installments_plan.description: Array of installment options with rates

first_installment_deferral.description: Number of periods before first installment

recipient_id.description: The recipient to send funds to

purpose.description: Purpose of the payout (see Purposes reference list)

from.description: Start date in ISO 8601 datetime format

to.description: End date in ISO 8601 datetime format

date_range.description: Date range for the report. Must use datetime format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'), not date-only format.

download_url.description: URL to download the completed report

message.example: The request body contains invalid or missing fields

field.description: JSON path of the invalid field

provider_error.description: Raw error from the payment provider, when available

error.message: The request body contains invalid or missing fields

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the event occurred

webhook_id.description: Unique identifier for this webhook delivery (use for deduplication)

status.description: The payment status that triggered this event

provider_name.description: The provider that processed the payment

refund_amount.description: Refund amount (only present for refund events)

refund_reason.description: Reason for refund (only present for refund events)

decline_reason.description: Reason for decline (only present for payment.failed events)

customer_id.description: The customer to create a session for

vaulted_token.description: Token for reuse in future payments

secret.description: Shared secret for HMAC signature verification
